summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll or Local Improvement District No. 4807 for the improvement of Massachusetts Street, from 32nd Avenue South to 34th Avenue South; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55526, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
